definition: point of a spear/edge of a tool/vanguard/forward (in sports team)
Young Pioneers of China (primary school league, a preparation for Communist Youth League)/abbr. to 少先隊|少先队

sentences.english: Tarrou, the chief fighter against the disease, is infected and dies.
sentences.chinese: 對抗疾病的先鋒塔魯卻染病身亡。

sentences.english: In the pilot, we are introduced to Felicity's creepy roommate.
sentences.chinese: 先鋒隊中介紹了費的令人毛骨悚然的室友。
豚草常是閒置耕地的先鋒植物。

sentences.english: "Forging the first class brand, being the pioneer of the line" is our perpetual goal.
sentences.chinese: “創一流品牌，做行業先鋒”是我們一直追求的目標。

sentences.english: Tree seedlings of pioneer species and non-pioneers may respond differently to canopy gaps.
sentences.chinese: 先鋒種和非先鋒種可能對林窗產生不同的反應。

sentences.english: Tree seedlings of pioneer species and non-pioneers may respond differently to canopy gaps.
sentences.chinese: 先鋒種和非先鋒種可能對林窗產生不同的反應。

sentences.english: McCardell is credited with pioneering the American look.
sentences.chinese: 卡德被視爲了美國時尚先鋒。

sentences.english: "With the nail polish there was something edgy or revolutionary, " she says.
sentences.chinese: 她說，“指甲油的那些命名是先鋒性和革命性的。”

sentences.english: Organizationally, it is the vanguard of a dismantled traditional hierarchy.
sentences.chinese: 這家公司堪稱廢除傳統等級制度的先鋒。

sentences.english: Maathai was a pioneer from an early age and in many spheres.
sentences.chinese: 馬塔伊在很小的時候在許多方面就是一個先鋒。

sentences.english: The President then indicated that those who use drugs are also those in the vanguard of anti-American protest.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，總統指出，吸毒同樣是反美的先鋒。

sentences.english: So the government should subsidise pioneers who break a path for others.
sentences.chinese: 所以政府應補貼爲後來者探路的行業先鋒企業。

sentences.english: My Cuisine Pioneer assignment was the Round Table Steak House.
sentences.chinese: 這次先鋒食客被安排在圓桌武士牛排屋。

sentences.english: Leading that grand armada were the minesweepers.
sentences.chinese: 這支浩浩蕩蕩艦隊的先鋒是掃雷艦。

sentences.english: One of the vehicles that bore the brunt of the first attacks, a Tiger of Das Reich's schwere panzer Abteilung.
sentences.chinese: 一輛充當‘急先鋒’的帝國師重裝甲營的虎式坦克。

sentences.english: John was the forerunner to Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 施洗約翰是耶穌的開路先鋒。

definition: to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
specific topic (addressed by a book, lecture, TV program etc)/article, report or program etc on a specific topic
peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
to originate/to initiate/to launch (an attack, an initiative etc)/to start/to propose sth (for the first time)
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
